reporting-org.narrative: Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research

title.narrative: vegIMPACT NL

description.narrative: 1. Stimulate and facilitate innovation for a sustainable and commercial horticultural sector. 2. Build the human capacity of private sector staff and teaching staff to lead the development of the horticultural sector in the coming decades. 3. Disseminate knowledge on Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) to vegetable farmers.
1. Vegetable farmers 2. Staff of agro-businesses 3. Young agro-professionals

The vegIMPACT NL program in collaboration with Indonesian and Dutch companies and the Indonesian Government will train 30,000 farmers, implement innovations in the seed potato value chain, develop true shallot seed systems, and upgrade the green vocational education and training system in Indonesia.

participating-org.narrative: Indonesian Centre for Horticulture Research and Development
Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research
Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research

sector.narrative: Post harvest management of shallots and seed potatoes
innovative research on true shallot seed systems and seed potatoes in collaboration with public and private sector
training crop experts and farmers, app development and outreach through website and Facebook

policy-marker.narrative: Food security, vocational education, private sector development
Institutional development & capacity building, innovations, gender

title.narrative: website van vegIMPACT NL

description.narrative: contains information on the different tracks, objectives and outputs of the program

title.narrative: Number of agro-professionals in the horticulture sector reached with digital and social media.

description.narrative: A program website, Facebook and the MyAgri app are used to reach out to farmers and other professionals with practical information on vegetable production.

title.narrative: Number of agro-professionals in the horticulture sector reached with digital and social media.

description.narrative: The indicator is a summation of vegIMPACT Facebook Likes, vegIMPACT website visitors and the number of downloads of the MyAgri app.

comment.narrative: The total number of Facebook likes and MyAgri downloads at the start of vegIMPACT. The website was not yet available at the start of the program.
The aim is to have a total of 100,000 vegIMPACT Facebook Likes, vegIMPACT website visitors and MyAgri downloads at the end of the vegIMPACT NL program

The value includes the number of vegIMPACT Facebook & Instagram followers, website visitors, YouTube subscriber and downloads of the MyAgri and SIPPINDO app. The people that have been reached with digital vegIMPACT NL material is much larger (>2 million) because of sharing, viewing, etc. Date: 31-12-2020

title.narrative: Partnerships with private sector companies in vocational education & training

description.narrative: As part of the young farmers track to improve the vocational education and training system in Indonesia new partnerships with the private sector companies are promoted. In this way students are better prepared for the labor market.

title.narrative: Number of partnerships with private sector companies in vocational education and training

description.narrative: New partnerships with private sector companies are established to link vocational education and training better with the needs of the labor market.

comment.narrative: At the start of vegIMPACT NL, there has been limited scope of practical cooperation between schools and industry.

dimension.name: Number of partnerhips with private sector companies

title.narrative: Number of shallot farmers reached.

description.narrative: In the Shallot track different innovative trials are implemented to support the development of true shallot seed (TSS) systems in Indonesia. Farmers can visit the trials and are invited during field days to share results and to raise awareness on TSS systems.

title.narrative: Number of farmers reached in the shallot trials

description.narrative: A logbook at the trial sites are available to register farmer visitors.

comment.narrative: The trials have not yet started. Hence, the number of reached farmers is zero

In different places across Indonesia where shallot trials are carried out farmers are exposed to the results during field visits and open field days. The aim is to have reached 3,000 shallot farmers through these trials at the end of the program.

title.narrative: Number of shallot sector professionals reached.

description.narrative: In the Shallot track innovative trials are implemented to support the development of true shallot seed (TSS) systems in Indonesia. During the trials shallot sector professionals (extension, input suppliers, crop experts, traders, etc.) are invited during field days to share results and raise awareness on TSS.

title.narrative: Number of sector professionals (excluding farmers) reached in the shallot track

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the professionals implementing and visiting the trials. A visitor logbook at the trials is available to monitor how many and which sector professionals visit the trials. Professionals include extension from both the public and private sector, agro-dealers, input supplier, traders, etc.

comment.narrative: At the start, few professionals have little knowledge on TSS.
The aim is to have reached 20 shallot professionals at the end of the vegIMPACT NL program.

title.narrative: Number of sector professionals reached in knowledge transfer activities

description.narrative: In the knowledge transfer activities, professionals (extension, product promoters, crop experts) are trained in good agricultural practices. Dedicated and multiple days of training of trainers are given. The trained professionals reach out to farmers.

title.narrative: Number of sector professionals reached with knowledge transfer activities.

description.narrative: Dedicated training of trainers are organized with the latest information on good agricultural practices in vegetable production

comment.narrative: At the start, sector professionals have little knowledge on good agricultural practices.
The aim is to have trained 200 sector professionals on good agricultural practices by the end of the program

title.narrative: Number of potato farmers reached

description.narrative: In the potato track various activities are implemented in which potato farmers are exposed to new knowledge and technology in the (seed) potato value chain

title.narrative: Number of potato farmers reached

description.narrative: In the potato track various activities are implemented in which potato farmers are exposed to new knowledge and technology in the (seed) potato value chain

comment.narrative: few potato farmers have access to knowledge on good management practices in (seed) potato value chain
The aim is to have reached 2500 farmers by the end of the vegIMPACT NL program

title.narrative: Number of farmers reached in knowledge transfer activities

description.narrative: In the track knowledge transfer, farmers are being trained, farmer field days and expo's are organized to disseminate knowledge on good agricultural practices in vegetable production.

title.narrative: Number of farmers reached through knowledge transfer activities

description.narrative: In the track knowledge transfer farmers are being trained, farmer field days and expo's are organized to disseminate knowledge on good agricultural practices in vegetable production. The number of farmers that is reached in the different activities are monitored by the program

comment.narrative: In general, vegetable farmers in Indonesia receive little training and do not have access to information on good agricultural practices.
The aim is to have reached 30,000 farmers with knowledge transfer activities at the end of the program

title.narrative: Number of reached private sector companies related to potato production

description.narrative: In the track seed potato value chain the human capacity is being built of different companies involved in (seed) potato production.

title.narrative: Number of reached private sector companies related to potato production

description.narrative: In the track seed potato value chain the human capacity is being built of different companies involved in (seed) potato production. The number of companies involved in potato activities is monitored.

comment.narrative: few companies have little knowledge on the requirements and characteristics of a well-functioning (seed) potato value chain
The aim is to have reach 25 companies involved in the (seed) potato value chains at the end of the project.

title.narrative: Number of students exposed to new teaching methods/material

description.narrative: In the young farmers track, the vocational education & training systems of Indonesia is improved. Two SMK's in Jember and Subang serve as pilots in which the students are exposed to the new training methods/material.

title.narrative: Number of students exposed to new teaching methods/material.

description.narrative: Students of the SMK's in Jember and Subang are exposed to new training material/methods.

comment.narrative: At the start, students were exposed to outdated teaching material/methods

title.narrative: Number of reached private sector companies related to shallot production

description.narrative: The Track Shallot in vegIMPACT NL aims to support farmers, sector professionals and private sector companies to develop true shallot seed (TSS) systems in Indonesia.

title.narrative: Number of private sector companies reached in the Track Shallot

description.narrative: vegIMPACT NL tests and demonstrates innovative aspects of True Shallot Seed systems together with private sector companies. Results of the trials are shared with other companies as well to raise awareness and improve knowledge on TSS.

comment.narrative: At the start, few private companies have knowledge on TSS.
The aim is to have reached 10 companies at the end of the vegIMPACT NL program with knowledge and information on TSS systems.

title.narrative: Number of potato sector professionals reached

description.narrative: Various activities in the potato track of vegIMPACT NL are aimed at the capacity building of potato sector professionals.

title.narrative: Number of potato sector professionals reached

description.narrative: Various activities in the potato track of vegIMPACT NL are aimed at the capacity building of potato sector professionals.

comment.narrative: Professionals in the seed potato value chain have limited knowledge about the requirements and characteristics of a well-functioning seed potato value chain
The aim is to have reached 20 potato sector professionals at the end of the vegIMPACT NL program.

title.narrative: Number of trained teachers at SMKs

description.narrative: Within the young farmers track, the vocational education & training system of Indonesia is improved. Two SMK's in jember and Subang serve as pilots in which teachers are trained.

title.narrative: Number of teacher trainings. One teacher can participate in / receive several trainings. These are counted individually as the topics can be very wide and cover different aspects of teaching.

description.narrative: Various capacity building activities for teachers are organized on institutional strengthening, curriculum development and teacher trainings.

comment.narrative: At the start, teachers had received very limited training.

dimension.name: number of teacher-trainings, i.e. the sum of teacher participants in program interventions

title.narrative: Number of private sector companies reached in knowledge transfer activities.

description.narrative: in the track knowledge transfer, different activities such as training of professionals, field days and expo's are organized to promote the knowledge on good agricultural practices.

title.narrative: Number of private sector companies reached with knowledge transfer

description.narrative: In the various activities of the track knowledge transfer the number of participating companies are monitored that benefit from these activities.

comment.narrative: At the start, few companies have little knowledge on good agricultural practices in vegetable production.
The aim is to have reached reached 10 companies at the end of the vegIMPACT NL program.
